subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: The culture and history of Brazilian fandom is being swept away by commercialization, activists say, as the country’s soccer stadiums are modernized for the World Cup and the Olympics.
snippet: The culture and history of Brazilian fandom is being swept away by commercialization, activists say, as the country’s soccer stadiums are modernized for the World Cup and the Olympics.
